educations.schoolName: Alfred State College - SUNY College of Technology

headline: System/network administrator
summary: Experienced Information Technology Specialist with a demonstrated history of working in the education, government and healthcare administration industry. Skilled in windows, Cisco technologies, network troublshooting, OS X, Mac OS X Server, Microsoft Word, Mac, and Windows Server. Strong information technology professional with a Bachelorâs Degree focused in Network and System Administration/Administrator from DeVry University.

defaultPosition.description:
Federal Contractor
Monitor the Remedy ticket queues, troubleshoot and resolve assigned hardware, software and LAN/WAN trouble tickets.
Fulfill Service Request, software installations and equipment configuration.
Update tickets following a documentation standard template, stating or restating the Issue, Actions Taken, and Next Actions Needed.
Create Active Directory computer and user accounts.
Manage Windows Server 2012 configurations, security patches and applications.
Provide support for VPN connectivity via Cisco VPN client, RSA token and/or smart cards.
Consult and coordinate activities with Engineering, Security, and Service Desk personnel.
Communicate plans, progress, and issues in a timely manner.
Participate in the weekly on-call duty rotation, providing after-hours support to customers and supported equipment.
Support peripheral devices including scanners and printers.
Support mobile devices such as IPhones, IPads, BlackBerrys and Air Cards.
Support business continuity plans and site readiness.
Maintain system backups utilizing Net Backup, and regularly conduct testing of restored data.
Documents, tracks and monitors all problems and requests to ensure a timely resolution.
Consistently meets the service target objectives and ticket resolution rates.
Performs other duties or special projects as assigned.
defaultPosition.title: System Administrator

positions.title: System Administrator

positions.description: Contracted as a Jr network engineer  to  support and upgrade the current network design  for  Concord Nursing Home. Providing network support for more than 130 devices connected to the network. Monitor and trouble shoot any network problems that occur as well and intrusion prevention.  Work along side with the Director of the Nursing home and the IT administrator; on the daily operations and improvements of the current network.
positions.title: Network /Systems Engineer

positions.description: Reserve IT Specialist for on call assistant during declare natural disasters. Assist with restoring damaged IT infrastructures. Terminating and running new patch panel lines.  Install network equipment, Roll out workstations. Work in conditions ranging from normal to severe.
positions.title: Emergency IT Specalist

positions.description: Troubleshoot and support End Users. Email and application problems. Presentation station problems, physical wiring issues. Basic workstation OS and re-image if necessary. Help Desk procedures. Assist in unboxing and installing network equipment as it applies to re-imaging in the summer months. Maintain computer inventory: system data backup and restoration procedures. Provide hardware and software evaluation to clients. Assist in the troubleshooting of telecommunications and network equipment problems.
positions.title: IT Consultant for Wantagh School district

positions.description: Maintain a transformation experience for customers throughout their journey at an Apple Retail Store. Educate customers on the use of consumer and professional application base on their goals. Provide complete and adequate solutions to customers, and build-long term relations with them and their product. Use diagnostic tools to deliver complete and accurate solutions to IOS Customers. Triage and trouble shoot both hardware, and software problems for OS devices
positions.title: Technical Support
